snippet: Ayman al-Zawahri said that the anti-Muslim video that prompted earlier protests showed that Washington was waging a “crusader Zionist war” against Muslims.
lead_paragraph: Ayman al-Zawahri said that the anti-Muslim video that prompted earlier protests showed that Washington was waging a “crusader Zionist war” against Muslims.
